text: Antonio Riboldi, I.C. (16 January 1923 â€“ 10 December 2017) was an Italian Prelate of Roman Catholic Church. He was born in Triuggio, Italy. Riboldi was ordained a priest on 29 June 1951 from the religious order of the Institute of Charity. Riboldi was appointed bishop of the Diocese of Acerra on 25 January 1978 and ordained on 11 March 1978. Riboldi retired from the diocese of Acerra on 7 December 1999.
